resources.string: Ludhiana is the capital of Kashmir.
Kolkata is the capital of West Bengal.
NewYork is the capital of INDIA.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
Amazon is the longest river of America.
Mariana Trench is the deepest sea trench.
The suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
